name: Zombie Smash Car Derby - Zombies Tsunami Killer 3D
name_original: Zombie Smash Car Derby - Zombies Tsunami Killer 3D
description:
Do you love to play zombie games? Here you have a chance to become zombie hunter by smashing them with car driving. The infected zombies are spread in the city it's your job to clean the modern city from big zombies and stop injustice.

Drive your furious car ruthlessly through a zombie apocalypse and make road kill! become the hero of city residents by showing no mercy to the tsunami of zombies that are coming out from earth to attack on your life car. Zombies are walking dead on earth endlessly you are the only hope of the infected city to stop the crawlers zombie attack.

Zombie Car Smash Derby Features:
- You can play it offline, no internet connection is required and it's lifetime free!
- Both Level mode and Endless mode with various relentless zombie types
- 4 weaponised cars for zombies apocalypse killing
- 3 different camera angles for car driving to become expert zombies smasher( Close, Far and inner car view )
- Make car drifts on road highway to kill zombies
